content: this legal document explains the progress of a legal case between mr sgg and ms mr ml mr sgg claims exclusive ownership of two apartments and a warehouse while ms mr ml claims coownership of an apartment and a warehouse the purpose of the document is to divide the common assets of the building which include a roof terrace a courtyard and a stairway the document assigns specific properties to each party with mr sgg receiving an understaircase room and a roof terrace and ms mr ml receiving a courtyard each share is valued at euro 5000 the document also states that the parties agree to end the existing coownership and divide the assets accordingly
